tweet.text: PUBLIC PRESENTATION Dec. 5, 2022 at 10am ET Attend Dr. Kristin Ahlberg’s #HAC presentation on the intellectual foundations of the foreign policy pursued by the Reagan administration. To register for this free online event, please send an email to FortJL@state.gov (1/2) https://t.co/w8ym29dmvL
